website_summaries.verdict: This one will do in a pinch, but it's not the most reliable with many units skipping or getting bad radio reception.
pros: Good sound when not using the bass boost
cons: More expensive models have better reliability

customer_reviews.title: Choose the right batteries
customer_reviews.text: This GPX CD player works well; highly recommended. A note about the BATTERIES, though: It requires two 1.5-volt AA batteries (for a total of 3 volts.) I would recommend using Akaline batteries. NiMH rechargable batteries (Nickle-metal-hydride) do not seem to work well, if at all. That's probably because NiMH batteries are actually 1.2 volts each (for a total of 2.4 volts, not 3.) It's because of the different chemistry they use. This CD player seems to be sensitive to the voltage level-- which is not that unusual, as some electronic devices just need the full 3 volts. Otherwise, the player works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Walker

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my grandpa
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 83 year old grandpa who still listens to CDs. He has macular degeneration and is legally blind. I was struggling to find a portable CD player like this with decent reviews, but decided to give this one a chance. He says it works very well and it does not skip. He has no problem using it, despite his vision impairment. I believe he mostly uses it around his apartment and when walking around the halls in their retirement community. All in all, it seems like a good product.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Brings a Little Joy
customer_reviews.text: My mother has dementia and remembers very little, but when I put an Andre Rieu CD in the player and put headphones on her...she sometimes will say Andre. That little CD player has given her the chance for a little peace and joy in her world of haze.
customer_reviews.author: Soxaholic

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Small. Does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine recorded, and sent me, a CD of some great music that he had on an LP. With all the digital and Bluetooth stuff, I realized that I no longer had a cd player, not even on my laptop. This little player does the job well. It has an extra bass feature as well as anti-skipping. It simply can not be beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: An elderly lady is so disappointed and I quite annoyed!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this item. I bought this for an elderly woman to listen to books on tape. When I took it to her I had batteries in and the cd in when I pressed the start button...nothing. Again pressed the start...nothing. When I took the headphones out, the player started but did not stop. Just frustrating for me and very disappointed lady. I had normal expectations for this product. Now, definitely not so much. Never again! I must look for a different brand and I hope theirs will perform better. Since I must give a star rating I would do .001% of a star. It will look like 1/2 star but believe me it’s barely that!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret M. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.text: A certain artist I like to listen to (Tool) doesn't release their albums on mp3 or make them available for streaming. I decided to purchase a portable CD player to enjoy some CDs when searching for Players I immediately noticed that they vary in price greatly (anywhere from 15-70$). I purchased this one thinking it was going to be cheap and i was right. The plastic is super cheap and flimsy and the headphones are basically useless, but the CD player does work and sounds OK. If you are looking for a good quality player this isn't it. If you are looking for a cheap player that works this will suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable CD Player!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this GPX PC332B portable CD player for my teenage son. Thanks to the anti-skip, he is able to walk around the room and still listen to his CDs. He had to read the directions to figure out how to get the radio to stop playing over the CD music, but once he read the manual, he was a happy camper. He likes to be able to have the choice of CD or music. We were glad that these came with headphones, however the ear pieces were too large for his ears so we purchased smaller ones. I would make this purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Khristena Sand

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I thought there was something wrong with the first one I got, because the LCD wasn't showing the radio stations. Amazon replaced it for me, and apparently it's how they're made. The LCD shows info for CDs though, so at least you can tell which track you're on. If you do use the radio, you'll have to seek until you find a station you like, though it seems to skip unused ones. When you turn it off and back on, it resets to the beginning, so you'll have to seek your way back to the station. I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Fae

customer_reviews.title: I would suggest you go to Walmart and as I did and got one for $22 and it has worked far better than this product
customer_reviews.text: This CD player was Cheap, but you get what you pay for. I was able to use it a couple days in my car, and it just quite working. Even when it did work, it was extremely sensitive to any vibration. I would suggest you go to Walmart and as I did and got one for $22 and it has worked far better than this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing is horrible. We bought it for our 4 year old son for Christmas, and upon opening it he was SO excited, it was his favorite gift by far...until we tried to use it. We put in alkaline batteries, as other reviews recommended, but it couldn't even play through a whole CD with one set of batteries. It kept flashing the 60 SEC sign as well, and then would randomly turn itself off. We had to tell our son he couldn't use his favorite Christmas present on Christmas day after all. Save yourselves the hassle, disappointment, and money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lobb

customer_reviews.title: Amazing CD Player.
customer_reviews.text: [Sound Quality]: The sound quality isn't crystal clear but it is amazing. It has a bit warmer sound than what you'd get from something more expensive or a computer but it sounds great. [Volume Control]: Its not too loud or too quiet, not much to say about it but. It has no EQ Options besides a bass boosted or not. I personally think the bass boosted mode sounds bad but that's just my opinion. [Battery Life]: I've been running it on the same two batteries for over a week or now and its great!!! [Misc]: Overall I have not had any issues with skipping in my pocket or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hibbler

customer_reviews.title: Just Throw Your Money in the Street
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time. Terrible product. The LCD screen did not work on the radio function right out of the box so trying to tune it was kind of a mystery. And while the LCD screen did light for the CD player, the player head only made it through one disk before starting to skip. Now every CD skips and most won't play track 1. That's a couple of hours I'll never get back!
customer_reviews.author: harv834

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't even turn on
customer_reviews.text: I returned this cd player. I tried various batteries (based on reviewers' recommendations), but after a couple of tries -- one of which yielded no response from the player and another which gave the "60 min" reading before going blank - I gave up and returned it. This was supposed to be a convenient little player to use for my few remaining cds, but if there were batteries that would make it work, I didn't own them. I wasn't expecting fabulous quality for this price, but I really expected it to at least power up. Super disappointing that products this bad exist.
customer_reviews.author: fairymama

customer_reviews.title: Sad song!  Do not buy!  can't hear CD without earbuds.  Useless!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed with this CD player. I wanted a brand new portable CD player that I could easily carry from one room to another, one that I could use to practice my song tracks. I'm not a professional but I love to sing and I've been asked to sing a solo in a few days. What I did not know and did not see anywhere in the description was that one can only hear the track using the earbuds provided. Defeats the purpose! I've wasted a couple days worth of time waiting for this item to come. Do NOT buy this player! Especially if you're hoping to listen to it from across the room while playing Scrabble.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Bonacker
customer_reviews.text: The player works very well and the anti-skip scheme is effective. BUT, while the FM radio also works fine the station numbers are not displayed on the little screen!! The result is you have to search interminably until you accidentally get to the station you want --- an unbeliveable piece of engineering nonsense. If the display showed the station numbers as you do a search I would of given the unit 4 or maybe 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bonacer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for a CD player
customer_reviews.text: While it does play CDs like it's suppose to, it's a battery drainer. Normal double As last only 8-10 hours with CD use. However, if you use the FM radio function, they'll last 3-5 days O.O It does skip and freeze a lot, but hitting it on the table helps. Besides that, quality it pretty good for a CD player! With the right ear phones you could have a good time!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this item should've been packaged much better. I'm sure some of the problems I had with it stemmed from it being jostled about in transit. The batteries don't last long at all. It is difficult to program, too. The earbuds were actually painful to use and soon after using this item, the left earbud stopped working. I was disgusted that after paying what I thought was not a bargain price, this item has not one thing to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Donna

customer_reviews.title: Not well made but basically works and there is a plus to it
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not worth more than $20.00 but it does work to play a language CD and it connects to an auxiliary cord in my car so that I can listen while I drive. This is actually a plus. The earbuds that come are incredibly uncomfortable but do work.
customer_reviews.author: lpdnm

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Cd player, just have trust issues
customer_reviews.text: I like this radio, I wasn't able to play my CD but I believe my CD maybe wasn't compatible. However, I am more careful with radios because I believe that they are not always use for the right reasons and I'm just starting not to like radios for this reason. Example like companies NOT Amazon but OTHER companies will use radios to control, and threaten you. I don't know the owner of this CD player but it doesn't matter just wanted to share my thoughts and prayers are with you and your family whoever is reading have a wonderful day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Value of All CD Players
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased to find this reasonable priced CD player. I love listening to my library books on CDs wherever I go and this portable player is so handy to take along. I use it in the car while my husband drives, in the motor home while on long trips, and while gambling at casinos. It is comfortable to wear the headphones as I take walks in the evening. It is lightweight, durable, and worth your purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jadda

customer_reviews.title: Welcome to 1993
customer_reviews.text: Come back to the 90's it's great here. For under $20 it works well. I have some CDs that I know I can transfer to MP3 but Im lazy and just wanted to be able to listen to them. I wouldn't spend more than $20 on any cd player but this one is fine. It seems to not skip so that's all I can ask for. Besides why would anyone want a tiny MP3 player when you can have this monster. You definitely get more plastic for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Benny the Cat

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have had a number of portable cd players but have never had one that would not play when in large pocket of shorts, robe, etc It will only play for any extended length of time if flat. Unfortunately dropped my Jentzen player yesterday and had this one on hand, always like to have back should what ha[[ened yesterday does not stop my book listening. there may be some trick I have not learned yet-but doubt it.
customer_reviews.author: Alice C.

customer_reviews.title: I am truly disappointed with this item
customer_reviews.text: I am truly disappointed with this item. It doesn't play CD's like it is supposed to which was the main reason I got it. The radio does not play well, with unclear station reception but I was so disheartened from the inability of the CD player to play that that feature is no longer important.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY BAD CHOICE, DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I received the player today. Put in batteries followed instructions and the player worked maybe one minute. The CD part stopped and will not play. The radio works but I didn't buy it for the radio. I would not recommend this to anyone. If you want a CD player find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: ieshaok

customer_reviews.title: CD player
customer_reviews.text: I received a second device and it worked for about a week and it also broke so I would not recommend buying this item . The CD player works well but it’s very disappointing because if you don’t use the AC DC charger it will play for very short amount of time. Showing people jog, walk, or anything else is false advertisement because you have to have the AC DC charger for it to play for any amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M.

customer_reviews.title: If you need something for a couple months this is the one for you
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply-made CD player but what do you expect for the price I expected it to work for a little bit longer than 2 months that's kind of what I expected I will not give it 5 Stars it will get three but realistically for the price what do I expect out of expect something top-quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality
customer_reviews.text: This is cheap. The cd skips or stop playing with the gentlest touch or movement. It stopped working after a month. I use it infrequently but have had to replace batteries 3x in the month. It turns off of paused for more than 10 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: wholewheatmomma

customer_reviews.title: NO CHARGER - WON'T WORK WITH JUST BATTERIES NOT INCLUDED
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit but for the price should have included charger needed to charge unit before use. Would not work on just adding two AA batteries. Just an added cost to the price of the unit that should have been included. Nicely made but disappointed couldn't use after purchasing CDs to use and did not want to go through additional expense by buying a charger. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: For it to work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and so far it plays well with great sound.fast shipping at a good price.as I just got it I can’t say how well the batteries last.highly recommend player and seller
customer_reviews.author: jack dube

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 3year old and it has withstood his handling. Multiple drops and everything still works great. Love the radio feature too.
customer_reviews.author: random shopper

customer_reviews.title: This works great.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to listen to books on tape/CD from our public library when I'm traveling with the family on the road. These audio books really help keep me awake and the rest of the family can sleep in quiet. It will use up a pair of AA batteries after about 10 discs or 1 1/2 books +/-. The radio reception is better than the van's radio with great range.
customer_reviews.author: jimmyb.1

customer_reviews.title: Fast Service. Visiting in CA and I was hoping it would make it here before going back home to MN.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know that the radio is only through the ear plugs. I thought maybe I'd be able to hear the music with a speaker in the device. Otherwise, good product and so happy to get it! I have been wanting this for a while now. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Starkey

customer_reviews.title: Great CD Player
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little CD player. I am actually listening to it as a write this review. The sound is excellent with headphone for such a little CD player. I would recommend this to anyone who wants a small compact CD player that you can carry around with you anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A. Yutzy

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one - CD player is cheap, because it does not last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this CD player for my mom in her 60s who still has a lot of CDs. After only two months of light use - she informed me that it keeps shutting off. This is after changing the batteries several different times. Don't waste your money on this. It's a piece of junk that will crap out on your loved one when they just want to enjoy some music.
customer_reviews.author: Bigmama Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, great performance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly for FM and it picks up more stations cleanly than I thought it was, For the price, it's great. But, there are two idiosyncrasies I noticed. 1, The FM works great but it doesn't display the station numbers and 2, the volume control is backwards than I'm used to. Otherwise, It's great, particularly considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Wise

customer_reviews.title: Pure Garbage/Fake Positive Reviews
customer_reviews.text: This thing is trash. Like many others have said, when you press play all that happens is it says “60 seconds” for a brief moment then goes blank and doesn’t play anything. To the person theorizing about Nimh batteries vs alkaline or whatever you said, you are incorrect. I have two 1.5V batteries in it and it doesn’t work. DONT BUY THIS. The positive reviews are either the lucky people who received working CD players or they work for the company.
customer_reviews.author: Krista h.

customer_reviews.title: Decent CD player
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. I just use this for listening to music without disturbing others. I have not tested the anti skip since I'm not jogging with it or anything, but after six months I have not experienced any issues with it in terms of quality or reliability.
customer_reviews.author: L. Norman

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to really mention this bad about
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good product compared to the hott CD player I like the FM radio works great I basically got it so I can listen to all the hundreds of CDs I have and I have a real nice Marshall Bluetooth speaker it works great with highly recommend all that particular one
customer_reviews.author: Ed Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended to others.
customer_reviews.text: The rationale for such a low rating is that it is only the CD player. Yes, it comes with ear buds and, as stated needs two AA batteries. It took a few times to get it to work, but it is working now. A BIG problem is that the power cord is an additional expense and to me is one of those: " Hey, what the hack -- No Cord ". I already demolished the packing material ( Oops ). To close --- please refrain from buying this CD player and buy one that includes everything. Have an blessed day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Used twice and not working any more
customer_reviews.text: We used this twice and the third try it was skipping a ton and then shut off. We aren't sure if it needs new batteries already but considering we only used it maybe 2 hours, that is crazy. It is also REALLY loud. It would drive anyone near you crazy to listen to it spin. Not worth it
customer_reviews.author: robTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, have used it for a while and it’s been shaky. Quality is meh, like you can hear the disk spinning in between songs, and for what was it? $18? I’m not suprised at all. If your looking for cheap it ok. Also If your looking for something in between getting a more expensive one like me I also recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Will not work
customer_reviews.text: Have tried for months to get this thing to work, took it to all of my family to try; no go. Then I got sick and am just now doing this review. When I E=mailed seller about this issue I was told to make sure it was turned on; I know my money is gone and I have no cd player , but, gee whiz; how do these people get vetted to sell on Amazon?
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cost player
customer_reviews.text: Good product, low cost. It comes with ear buds, but u do have to insert them to hear the cd. Doesn't just play without the ear buds
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Divers

customer_reviews.title: Watch the springs where the batteries are placed..
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave this cd player 3 stars instead of five is because when setting up- it wouldn't work. I used new batteries and followed instructions. The problem was where the batteries sit. The springs were already causing a problem. We fixed it and now it works fine. Just hope later in the future, those springs dont cause any more problems. With a new item- there shouldn't be any problems getting it to work, but it was for us. This is a warning to watch the springs and be careful.
customer_reviews.author: KLH65

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find out it has a radio with good reception...what a bonus..and headset.
customer_reviews.text: Has plastic that doesn't flex but other than that its a wonderful radio for my religious tapes before bed or music or whatever. Very happy. Thanks for making my low-rider, fixed income (for now) dreams come true. Thanks, Amazon vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Smooth

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Did the job for the one month I needed it for. Battery life sucks no matter what voltage you buy. Also if you pause it for too long you can’t go back to where you left off, which was very important to me for listening to lectures.
customer_reviews.author: PattyCastro

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within 20 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this CD player to use for studying material for an upcoming licensing exam. I was on the fence due to some other reviews mentioning issues with this player no longer working shortly after beginning to use. I installed fresh batteries, began listening to my CD and within 20 minutes, the CD player turned itself off suddenly. Now, when I try to turn it on, the CD begins to turn and the screen comes on for about 2-3 seconds before turning itself off again. It wiill no longer play and a change of batteries did not fix it. I am extremely disappointed in the performance of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Emazon Kustomer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works great , just didn't know had to use the headphones to listen. using for audiobooks
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: used it for a while after I got it and has good sound and plays
customer_reviews.text: came a day late do to recant snow storm, used it for a while after I got it and has good sound and plays well
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: I use to exercise and clean house have trouble with it turning off not good on anti skip. Radio is great though. Sucks battery’s more than the one I had before. Overall not bad for the price though. It’s cool it had radio too picks up several stations.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it works perfectly no skipping Better then the last CD player I got on here
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Intuitive, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This player's controls are so much more intuitive and easy to use than others that I've had. And the quality is good, not cheap, like other reviewers said. I am very happy with this purchase, and using it often.
customer_reviews.author: Wister

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is great!
customer_reviews.text: Such great sound for such a small player. I love it. I did purchase headphones to use with it because it's more comfortable for me. The price was great, too. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: It just plays cds, but works just as well as a Sony Walkman I had years ago that cost ten times as much. No instructions, but not hard to figure it out. If you want a portable CD player, for $16 you can’t lose.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Not the best of sound
customer_reviews.text: Not the best of sound. Guess I was expecting more from something that’s been around for as long as they’ve been around. Thought they would have had some improvements since the last time they were manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kay Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: They tell me it's great...
customer_reviews.text: I was asked to purchase this for someone who doesn't have a credit card so I do not speak from personal experience, but they tell me it's great. I had purchased 3 devices. What more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: outsidethebox

customer_reviews.title: very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is cheaply made - the covering for the batteries fell off as I opened the package. I have used this gently and infrequently in the month since I bought it, and it now does not work at all. The instructions are unhelpful and the operation is counterintuitive. I would strongly recommend not buying this.
customer_reviews.author: fantundo

customer_reviews.title: Unless you just HAVE to have it like I did, don't.
customer_reviews.text: I know CD'S are obsolete, but if you're still selling something, sell it right. This came with no instructions -- nothing. It took me an hour trying to remember the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The ear phones give a fuzzy sound.
customer_reviews.text: Tried my head phones. Much better sound. Pretty good for the $$$. After using this unit I have found it skips while walking. Will play a CD a few minutes & quit. Have requested a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: John Thabet

customer_reviews.title: it stop automatically after 5 min. was not battery broblem
customer_reviews.text: I usually listen in the car witch don't have mp3 player, but stop playing after 5 min. I tried instruction what they gave me by e-mail, not solved problem. now they will replace new product, hope this works fine. otherwise great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Hyangsook yu

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, and LED was dysfunctional, wouldn't display the FM radio stations call signs as I pushed through searching for a station I would like. I returned it and went to Wally World and picked one up for 22$, which works great. I'd suggest either choosing a better model or going to a local store rather than buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cissie

customer_reviews.title: Get a better instruction page guide
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were not clear and the unit has no way to secure it from falling, Such as a belt or velcro clip. I never could get it to pause and resume . I had to write down the number from the window and then when I was ready to resume, I had to fast forward to the approximate position. Then i answered the phone by turning my head and dropping the unit off my table to the floor when the ear buds pulled. The unit is not working. I had to go to WalMart and buy a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Gullett

customer_reviews.title: Yeah it's cheap...
customer_reviews.text: I knew that when you buy something cheap, quality is really bad. I bought it basically because I was desperate to listen to something after my other cd player (of over 5 years) wore out its cd felt pads to keep the disc running smoothly. If you are looking for something that is durable, with good quality, look somewhere else, honestly. The product looks better in the photo. The only reason battery life is good is because of the radio...
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pothoven

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is awful
customer_reviews.text: Sound is fine, but, I am having to replace the batteries every 3 days... this is ridiculous! Especially since I listen to a cd for 45 mins a day... can't recommend... sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Cindi B

customer_reviews.title: small and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I love this disc player. I take it with me in the morning as I sit and enjoy the early morning stars and listen to soft music. I had to get new earplugs but the disc itself is well worth the minimal cost
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Battery running fast
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the sounds wasn’t clear and the battery is last for only a few days,prefer is rechargeable better than battery I was use is to play real estate CD only can finish maybe two sessions of CD then is run of ou battery.
customer_reviews.author: Paris2

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life - returned item
customer_reviews.text: Battery life on this product was horrible. Put in brand new batteries, my three year old listened to her CD once, tried to turn the CD player on again later... dead. So we put in new batteries. Listened to a CD later again, made it halfway through the CD... dead. Not acceptable, returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: BZ77

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Got this for myself. Bad idea. It came with no instructions and no way to charge it. It goes through batteries or crazy. It doesn't seem to shut off when it is in the off position.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica pelock

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this item. It states that it plays CD's without skipping but this is not the case. I love to walk and listen to Audio book tapes. I start listening to them and they will quit on me. I thought it may be the CD so I got another one out (new) and tried it. Same problem. Not really happy with this product so I put it in the 'get rid of' pile.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Jasik

customer_reviews.title: The digital readout screen is blank in FM mode. ...
customer_reviews.text: The digital readout screen is blank in FM mode. Had I known it was designed that way I wouldn't have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter McCormack

customer_reviews.title: Cheap piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken, with a door that won’t latch. Too cheap to bother sending back, so I slapped a rubber band around it to make it work. Not recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kenail

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: This was not the usual quality product I'm used to. Sound was not a problem at all. The issue started with short battery life. Even new ones didn't last more than a couple hours. The worst surprise happened when new batteries started to heat up immediately & began to distort. The whole unit went in the garbage outside!
customer_reviews.author: Chem Teacher

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband's birthday. He is a stroke victim and can do nothing for himself. This was supposed to give him some enjoyment other than TV. They fail to tell you it needs an AC/DC adapter. So basically for his 60th birthday he got nothing! Thanks for nothing
customer_reviews.author: Christine D.

customer_reviews.title: Not a reliable item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this CD player on May 10, it completely quit working on July 12. When it worked it was great but it no longer works. 2 months is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: P. Parris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use CD player
customer_reviews.text: This a good player for the price. It doesn't skip , and is light weight and easy to use. Arrived on time and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper

customer_reviews.title: super cheap but does what it needs
customer_reviews.text: Luckily my wife only needed this thing for a short period of time (one Month). However within that time, the headphone that came with it completely disassembled themselves. She did not drop them, smash them in a door, or step on them, but these are all events I would use to explain how they look now... COMPLETE fallen apart. Pretty stinking cheap... the CD player did what it needed to do without too much issue.
customer_reviews.author: Branden

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: The product is decent. Make sure your in a good location for the radio. 1 thing i didnt like was that it doesnt show what radio channel you are listening too.
customer_reviews.author: Hanniel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, it has a major defect!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS! There is a major defect with the audio processing chip where the audio output can’t switch between the radio and the cd and it’s stuck on the radio! Also the package was obviously previously opened and the manufacturing date was July 2011.
customer_reviews.author: VLS

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could listen to my old CDs but it only worked for a few seconds then stopped. Tried this several times and with different CDs but it would stop after a few seconds. I'm 81 years old and this is a real problem to get this returned or replaced.
customer_reviews.author: ozzie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My son has a disability and music is his life! We buy these things like hot cakes! Easy for him to work but goes through the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie M.

customer_reviews.title: This isn't very good, but it was cheap.
customer_reviews.text: The LCD display doesn't work and the CD player skips. This is right out of the package. Oh well... I didn't waste too much money.
customer_reviews.author: jackel88Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Machine that does everything it is supposed to do at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great Little Machine that does everything it is supposed to do at a great price. Lightning fast shipping was a plus too. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Arkengareth

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I should have known that you get what you pay for, but I at least expected it to play! No..i sound, even thru the ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Well, the CD side of the unit only lasted a couple of weeks before it stopped working. When the CD door is closed the screen shows the lid is still open and will not play. So the CD option in my opinion is worthless. All I have now is a FM radio. This was a present for a family member that had a stroke and has limited movement and slight. Do Not Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Stopped spinning cd’s within the first 10 minutes of use, radio is now the only thing that works. I would like a brand new one sent to me because this one is defective
customer_reviews.author: John O.

customer_reviews.title: This devise works really well.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this devise for several weeks and I use it for books on disc's . I have been through 6 books with no problems. Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: N. L. Obertal

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: As expected. No skipping or issues- purchased to listen to old CD last and add the old music to my apple music
customer_reviews.author: darlene mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: CD Player
customer_reviews.text: I know it's kind of old-fashioned to use a CD player but I have a lot of books on CD that I want to listen to without disturbing the rest of my family. It works great and the price was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: After listening to one xden6c, battery life is gone, I'm constantly changing the batteries.. DON'T like that. No usb cord. It's ok!!
customer_reviews.author: Jillybean

customer_reviews.title: A great bargin price for what all that it comes with.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend. She loves the quality of sound. That it comes with ear buds, fm radio and a spot for a cord to plug into wall outlet. I was able to find her a plug. Now her batteries will last even longer. She will only use them during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to using this as I have an enormous collection of CDs but sadly I found when it finally arrived that it wouldn’t work. Another waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Je suis Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive CD Player No Frills
customer_reviews.text: If looking for an inexpensive personal CD player with no frills, this model should serve. Simple operation. The anti-skip function does need to be turned on for most operations, I have found. Sound quality is good. FM tuner is a random scan type which eventually lands on the station sought, but it would have been preferable if the FM station's call sign would appear in the LED window to make tuning easier. It isn't always obvious the correct station has been located until the program presenters speak and are identifiable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blakeney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product CD
customer_reviews.text: This CD radio portable player arrived and it is a delight. The sound quality and ease of controls are magnificent. It is clean and sturdy. It arrived early as well.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all. I put brand new batteries in it and I heard static while the batteries were halfway in. When the batteries were fully inserted correctly, nothing worked. I had to return the CD Player. Couldve been one defective product...It happens. I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: staite

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very staticky I tried new headphones and it was better but not great quality. Don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angela W.

customer_reviews.title: Misinformation
customer_reviews.text: Will ONLY WORK with an AC/DC power source. Advertised as PORTABLE CD player with earphones, no mention of REQUIRED POWER SOURCE. Do not want it.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne G.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great with the right earbuds. I walk fast and hard and don't have any skipping from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Awesome find
customer_reviews.text: I need it this for the audiobooks I borrowed from the library. It works great and has good sound
customer_reviews.author: marlove15

customer_reviews.title: No LED displayed
customer_reviews.text: The cd player did not display the radio station or any of the cd songs when I opened it. Very disappointed bc it was needed for a vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Quintella

customer_reviews.title: High pitched noise emitted while playing CD
customer_reviews.text: I use this player with students for a reading program. It works as advertised and actually has good sound quality through the headphones. The only problem is that the player makes a high-pitched whining noise that everyone else can hear while it plays a CD. I needed two players, but bought this one first to try it out and probably will not purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle

product_meta.title: GPX PC332B Portable CD Player with Anti-Skip Protection, FM Radio and Stereo Earbuds - Black
product_meta.description: Listen to your favorite CDs or FM radio stations on the go with the GPX Portable FM Radio and CD Player. This portable player features 60-second skip protection, programmable tracks, an LCD display, and low battery indicator. Stereo earbuds are included to give you maximum listening enjoyment. Requires 2 AA batteries (not included). Black.
feature_bullets: Portable CD player and radio with earbuds
60 second anti-skip protection for CDs - not intended for consistent running or jogging
Note: Refer user manual for troubleshooting steps.
For CD use, select CD source on device and be sure that CDs are music CDs from an original source (computer CDs and data CDs not compatible)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars2,190 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
